original: unfold isPR. intros n g h [pf_g H_g] [pf_h H_h]. split. - exists (fun x => forall y, g x y = h x y). intros x. split. + intros y. specialize (H_g x y). specialize (H_h x y). congruence. + intros y. specialize (H_g x y). specialize (H_h x y). congruence. - intros k pf_k H_k. exists (fun x y => k x). split. + intros x. apply pf_k. + intros x. intros y. apply H_k.
